entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
